game.name: Puppy Blast
game.description:
Puppy Blast is an awesome fun-filled arcade game with hundreds of challenging puzzles. In this brand new free online game, you will have to get a chance to play with a cute puppy. Keep solving different puzzles, tapping the same color blocks to remove them, finding some bombs to have a have blast. Each level comes with unique challenges and rewards. Play this puzzle-based game with full of attention and show the world that you are a champion of solving any kind of complex puzzles! Challenges increase as soon as you move to the advanced level of the game. 

Tap at least 2 same color blocks to remove them. Once itâ€™s done, remove 10 same color blocks to attain the target. In the second level, you have to tap 5 adjacent same color blocks and see what will happen. When you are done, feel free to try out the power of Missile. You can also combine 5 or 6 same-color blocks into a Missile. You can remove a row or column of blocks using a missile. Tap to skip and move to the advanced level. Use your puzzle-solving skill to complete each level with a score of 3 stars. 

Your good performance in this cool puzzle game will allow you to receive different rewards meanwhile. Keep accepting and unlocking them and get ready to attain some gold and power-ups! Make sure to complete each level with 3-star performance to secure more rewards in the future. In the third level, you will have to tap 7 same color blocks. Once you are done, a bomb will be made for you. Tap on it to clear all the near-by blocks in this addictive HTML5 game. Reach 10 level and boost your energy performance for 2h.
